story: Your super suit gets destroyed in an elevator mishap, but edna Mode agrees to design a new one for you!
Thomas O'Malley leads you across the Paris rooftops and safely back home to Adelaide's house.
Don't believe in ghost stories? Time to start, 'cause you're in one!
Queen Narissa has banished you from Andalasia into te streets of New York City.
This time you KNOW the sky is falling, but the citizens of Oakey Oaks won't believe you!
The Beast agrees to let you take your father's place as his prisoner.
You realize that you still have a wish to ask of your Fairy God Mother!
Look at that! Andy has elected a new favourite toy... and it's you!
